name: Nature 2098 - You Are Snack
description:
Nature 2098 - You Are Snack is top down grub shooter reminiscent of the Windows 98 "Nature" screensaver, created for #screensaverjam


How to play

  • Move mouse and use left click to pilot your insect
  • Collect orbs to fire weapons
  • Avoid running into grubs
  • Press F11 to toggle fullscreen
  • Press Esc to quit

Completion stats
- Jam Length - 72 hours (Jan 22 - Jan 24 2016)
- Original Development Length - ~36 hours
